thread.title: Watch: Driver arrested for driving school bus at 180 km/h
thread.title_full: Watch: Driver arrested for driving school bus at 180 km/h

title: Watch: Driver arrested for driving school bus at 180 km/h
text: Watch: Driver arrested for driving school bus at 180 km/h Web Report /Dubai Filed on February 19, 2017 | Last updated on February 19, 2017 at 12.39 pm Share Vote The bus was carrying 12 female students when it was spotted overspeeding. A school bus driver in Saudi Arabia has been arrested for driving at more than 180 km/hr.According to media reports, the minibus was carrying 12 female students when it was spotted by a car driver, who made a video clip that went viral on social media.The video shows the car driver shifting the camera between the careless bus driver and his speedometer.The video was reportedly shot in the Jizan region of the Kingdom. Share
